unnormalised: My tailor, Anwar bhai, usually needs about 2 meters of cloth for a simple salwar suit, but this time, he asked for 2.5 m because of the fancy sleeves I wanted.
normalised: My tailor, Anwar bhai, usually needs about two meters of cloth for a simple salwar suit, but this time, he asked for two point five meters because of the fancy sleeves I wanted.
